name: Gaia (itch) (Hallowd Games)
description:
You play as a little rocky friend who needs to find his way back to the core of the earth,  Gaia. On the  way  you need to find new skills and avoid corruption.

This game was made in  72 hours instead of 7 days for the Content Creator Jam.

Limitation: You  are the world

Theme: One Player Multiplayer. ( Did not achieve this :c )

ASWD to move and jump.

When you get the fish power up, press W in the water to slowly rise.

When you get the bird power up, press W in the air to double jump.
